alert.note: Alert for City of Newport News; Gloucester; James City; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 3:22PM EDT until May 04 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GLOUCESTER...CENTRAL YORK...SOUTHEASTERN JAMES CITY AND EAST CENTRAL SURRY COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 322 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Busch Gardens, or near Queens Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Lee Hall and Fort Eustis around 330 PM EDT. Newport News and Denbigh around 335 PM EDT. Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, Patrick Henry Field, Gloucester Point and Wicomico around 340 PM EDT. Achilles around 350 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Newport News Golf Course, Lackey, Water Country U.S.A., Oyster Point, Oriana, Hog Island Game Reserve, Hornsbyville, Harris Grove, U.s. Naval Weapons and Menchville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Newport News; Gloucester; James City; Surry; York
